title: Improve AI Model Performance with Embedding Visualization | Nomic Atlas Documentation

overview.description: This guide explores how embedding visualization can enhance AI model performance by providing insights into data structure and relationships.
overview.purpose: To leverage visualization techniques for debugging, improving, and optimizing AI models.

embedding_visualization.definition: A method to represent high-dimensional embeddings in a low-dimensional space for analysis.
importance: Identifying clusters and patterns in data.

step_1.title: Generate Embeddings
details: Create embeddings using a pre-trained model or custom-trained neural networks.
Ensure embeddings are meaningful and represent the data adequately.

techniques.name: t-SNE
techniques.description: A technique for dimensionality reduction, particularly useful for visualizing high-dimensional data.

techniques.name: UMAP
techniques.description: A method that preserves both local and global structure, often faster than t-SNE.

techniques.name: Nomic Atlas
techniques.description: An interactive platform for embedding visualization with advanced filtering and analysis tools.

step_3.title: Upload and Process Data in Nomic Atlas
details: Upload your embeddings and associated metadata to Nomic Atlas.
Use filters and search tools to explore specific data points or clusters.

step_4.title: Analyze and Interpret Visualizations
details: Identify clusters to understand data groupings.
Locate outliers or anomalies for further investigation.
Use metadata to add context to visual patterns.

best_practices.embedding_quality: Ensure embeddings capture the semantic relationships in the data.
best_practices.metadata_usage: Incorporate metadata to provide additional context during visualization.
best_practices.tool_selection: Select the appropriate visualization technique based on the dataset size and analysis goals.

use_cases.model_debugging: Visualize embeddings to identify issues like class overlap or poor separation.
use_cases.data exploration: Gain insights into the structure and distribution of datasets.
use_cases.performance optimization: Use visualization to refine embeddings and improve downstream tasks.

conclusion.summary: Embedding visualization is a critical tool for improving AI model performance. Nomic Atlas provides an intuitive platform for exploring and analyzing embeddings effectively.
actionable_next_steps: Leverage Nomic Atlas for visualization and analysis.
Iterate on model and data improvements based on insights.
